reviews.review:
salts are worse than plasmids in every way
you can now carry only 2 weapons, no special ammunition for each weapon at all, and weapon upgrades do not change the appearance of the weapons
story lacks continuity and tries to makes up for it with some "multiple timelines" b.s.
in the previous games you could interact with ur envionment a lot more esp with plasmids, whereas in this game if you jump in the wrong corner of the map or on random objects you get stuck and you are forced to re-do ur progress

the good things were elizabeth's tear system as well as the skylines and grapple hooks. that's it

음... 다른사람들이 좋은말만 하니까 난 나쁜점을 적겠음. (이 게임이 나쁜게임이란건 아님)

제일먼저 퇴보된 게임성들 전작들보다도 전투면으로는 확실하게 퇴화되었음, 
1. 초능력을 전부 얻을수 있고 초능력이 사실 거기서 거기가 된게 문제 (거의 전부 상대를 정신없게 하는게 목적이고 전부 함정를 만드는 효과를 가지고 있음) 

2무슨 콜옵마냥 총을 두가지만 들고 다닐수 있게 바뀜, 근데 무기는 한개만 특화해서 다닐 수 없게 탄약이 부족하게 설계됨.

3.체력과 MP회복이 루팅해서 쳐먹는것만 되서 초능력을 신나게 쓴다거나 하는것도 제한됨, 

4.거의 완전히 일직선 진행이기 때문에 맵을 되돌아가서 미쳐 발견 못했던걸 다시 찾거나 가방이 꽉차서 못얻던것을 회수하는게 불가능, 

5. 저번작은 일반적인 편의재화인 돈과 중요재화인 아담이 나뉘어져 있어서 무엇을 아껴야 할지 알수있지만...
이번작은 돈으로 통합됨, 덕분에 업그레이드가 아닌 다른 물건을 사면 무조건 손해가 되버림,
여기에 4번 문제가 합쳐지면 의심암귀수준으로 맵을 싹싹 돌아댕기는데 이게 끔직하게도 지루하고  부담감이감.
군데 아오 씨발 지갑은 한도가 있음. 아니 왜 한도가 있냐고?! 일직선이잖아!! 나중에 돌아가서 돈못줍잖아!
돈이 존나 중요한데!!! 중간에 돈꽉차면 뭔가 자판기에서 사고 대체 어디에 남겨뒀는지도 까먹을만한 돈을 또 주우러 가야해!! 맵 바뀌면 못주우니까 이짓거리를 한맵에서 왔다갔다해야 한다고!! 게다가 뒤지면 돈이 증발함!!!
이게 제일 좆같음

6. 그리고 샹 전작의 강화제(장착하면 특정 버프를 주는 중요아이템)포지션인 의상이 시발 뭔 랜덤으로 뜸. 덕분에 전작처럼 어떤 원하는 컨셉의 플레이를 하겠다  라는게 확정적이아니라 나올때까지 리셋하던지 못하고 꾹참고 가던기가 됨.

7. 적들이..... 그리이이이..... 인상깊지않음, 뭔가 전작의 빅대디같은 임팩트있는 녀석이 없음 (송버드는.... 스포일러...)

8. 아니... DLC2 잠입 액션? 애초에 이 게임 잠입에 어울릴만한 AI를 가지질않았는데?  스페션 땡스 코지마 히데오 라고 써놓지 그러냐??

다음으로 스토리 관련. 스토리자체는 좋은 스토리지만...
(스포일러 주의)

1. 분기점? 선택지는 중간에 아이템이나 다르게 받는정도고 스토리에 하나도 지장없이 엔딩은 하나, 착하게살던 나쁘게 살던 어짜피 부커는 엘리자베스한테 익사당하고, 귀하게 챙긴 엘리자베스는 DLC에서 뒤짐.

2. 송버드는 ㅈㄴ 중요하게 나올것 같더니 샹 대체 뭐냐.

3.전작과는 달리 설정이 더럽게 난잡하고 편의주의적임, 샹 플라스미드에 부작용이 없는걸 만들었다고? 

4. 하도 막 균열을 써서 상황이 너무 확확바뀌는 나머지 나중에가면 '시발 뭐가 어떻게된거지' 싶을때가 생기는 난잡한 모습, 한번더 말하지만 이럴거면 멀티엔딩을 내던가. 적어도 그럼 내가 이런짓 해서 이렇게되었구나 싶지. 이건 뭔....

5. 솔직히 바이오쇼크1,2 랑은 단순히 오마쥬수준으로 했을것이 나았을것 같은 덕분에 설정구멍이 더생긴 DLC시리즈.

마지막으로 대체 플레이어한테 전하고 싶은 교훈에 대해서 말하자면.
제작진이 전하고싶은 교훈자체는 전작에 써먹었던 대로, 전체주의와 신격화의 대한 비판은 이미 2편에서 썻음.
근데. 솔직히 이야기를 보면 이렇게 느껴짐.

'한번이라도 잘못하면 뒤져야 한다. 참회고 뭐고, 그냥 잘못하면 자살해라. 너에게 두번째 기회따윈 없다'

This isn't Bioshock!!! It's clearly a COMPLETELY different game compared to the original two games. Different isn't bad, but when the game isn't connected to the original Bioshock series, besides a GLORIFIED fan service reference to the original Rapture city. Besides it being a cash grab in a sense, the story is a complex multiverse mess. With adding the multiverse, it weakens the original universe we originate from. 
Don't get me started with the OVERRATED ending.

OVERALL:
The game-play is more than fine, it's a weaker version of the combat mechanic in the original series. Infinite is visually gorgeous, it certainly keeps the beautiful scenery from the original games. Unfortunately the story falls flat when the multiverse is brought up upon. 

In the end, I don't recommend this game one bit of you're expecting a classic like the first two Bioshock games. But it does have a mediocre stand alone game.

Sinceramente no lo recomiendo a menos que solo compres la colección completa en oferta, puesto que, la historia de la campaña y la de los DLC no es mala pero solo te deja con muchas preguntas sin respuesta, tus acciones durante el juego no afectan en casi nada a la historia, después de completarlo no deja con ganas de mas, ya que, no hay ningún objetivo para realizar, ni algún final en especial que desbloquear... tenía altas expectativas con este título teniendo en comparación los anteriores pero al menos a mi parecer se quedo bastante pobre en historia y solo usaron los recursos en entregarte unos gráficos excelentes.

A game way too ambitious for its time, that had major content cut-backs as a result of release era consoles, crunch and cost in making the game. You can feel this fact throughout the game. But even still the game is very beautiful and had me with my mouth open just from the intro (not lying). The characters are lovable and story enjoyable. I just wish that we got the full product even after all these years. Please remake this game!!!
A regular person wouldn't be disappointed if picked up.
My favourite Bioshock game in the series. Great characters, great story, and great game play.

Es un buen juego, sin embargo tiene muchos "peros". El primero es, que para disfrutarlo es mejor no compararlo con Bioshock 1 y 2, que con unas obras de arte en ambientación, historia y jugabilidad. El segundo son los DLC, no aportan nada, son un intento desesperado de que columbia y rapture estén conectadas entre si de alguna manera, y lo único que consiguen es que la historia de Infinite sea algo peor, pues, al menos a mí lo que cuentan me han dejado con muy mal sabor de boca. Entre otros "peros" que prefiero no mencionar para no extenderme demasiado. Recomiendo encarecidamente jugar Bioshock 1 y 2 antes que Infinite, solo por el hecho de que los DLC de este título contienen spoilers importantes de los anteriores.

This is the BEST BioShock game in the series. When I first played this back in 2014 I was 17 years old. Now I´m 25 and this game has aged well. I still think this has the best story and visuals there is, and the gameplay is very fun. If you dont like this there is something seriously wrong with you, because there aint many games like this anymore. Literally the perfect game. Top 5 games of my lifetime for sure. If this does not convince you then nothing will. 11+/10

It's alright.

The setting is stunning and Elizabeth is a well-written character.  She's Rapunzel, but manages to avoid being an overly-goofy, fish out of water.

The pitched battles can be quite difficult, as you are usually attacked by a lot of enemies at once, and it's not easy to use the keys for movement, melee attacks, and aim with the mouse at the same time.  

The game feels simpler than the earlier ones in this series.  No real puzzles or choices.  Just walk forward, collect stuff and shoot people.

The moral ambiguity of Rapture is missing.  It's clear who the bad guys are, here.  Even so, the average person in this setting is unthreatening, and so shooting up a bunch of their policemen feels more like murder than defending myself from splicers did.  

There are a lot of things that I would like a better explanation of, but the main character doesn't ask very many questions.  

The game is entertaining enough but the experience of it doesn't feel as compelling as the earlier games.

Changing my review to negative after playing the game more.  The pitched battles in the game are not fun, and there are a lot of them.  It doesn't really matter if you die in the battle because you come right back, and you don't need to plan, because Elizabeth tosses you whatever you need.  At some point, I quit listening to the story, because the story is irrelevant.  The pitched battles are the only time you can do anything and they are a miserable experience.

Absolutely amazing game, fair warning, it does not run on windows 11

Historia decente. Mal FPS.

Nos presenta una ciudad bonita y prometedora, pero no profundiza mucho. ¿Dónde obtienen su comida? ¿Hay huertos o animales en algún sitio?

Las interacciones con Elisabeth son bastante buenas e interesantes.

¿Música? Creo que hay una melodía durante el combate.

Gráficos buenos.

[b]Pero la jugabilidad...[/b]
Limitar las armas a dos es bueno hasta que se te acaba la munición en mitad de un tiroteo.
Abuso de la tecla F. Rebusca todos los cajones para coger un plátano.
Los tiroteos son todos iguales: una horda de enemigos te congela en un lugar hasta que acabas con todos.
Apenas hay jefes, sólo enemigos grandes que se repiten. [spoiler]Hay un único jefe.[/spoiler]
Algunos enemigos requieren veinticinco tiros de pistola para matarlos.
Hay un tipo humano que aguanta TRES COHETES en su cuerpazo.
El handyman no te deja poner distancia de por medio.
En el enfrentamiento final no te dejan muy claro el objetivo.

El final... ejem... [spoiler]Rapture ahí no pinta nada[/spoiler].

Et c'est aujourd'hui que j'ai terminer les 3 Bioshock. Pour être honnête Bioshock Infinit m'a complètement retourné le cerveau. Dimension d'origine, multivers, tout ce bordel, faut s'accrocher pour comprendre l'histoire du troisième Bioshock. Bref, mon avis reste le même, jouez y vous ne regretterez jamais d'y avoir joué.

Ett vid detta lag rätt gammalt spel, men fortfarande ett av de bästa single player FPS'er som gjorts! Rafflande story och grafik som ännu håller (hyfsat) bra. En värdig avslutning på Bioshock sagan och skippa fortsättningen (Burial at Sea).

超级优秀的第一人称射击探索类游戏，美轮美奂的哥伦比亚，和阴森恐怖的销魂城。官方打造了一个活脱脱的伊丽莎白，一颦一笑一举一动都让人感到快乐舒坦，官方刻意抓住了玩家对伊丽莎白的喜爱，最后在海葬DLC中安排了一出悲剧，把美好的伊丽莎白硬生生毁灭给了大家看。和辐射3一样，是一款让我讨厌不起来的悲剧故事。
伊丽莎白的我咬吕洞宾
Любовь с первого взгляда ^^

游戏的开始就被壮丽的天空城深深吸引住了，但是随着不断地探索，你会发现在美丽的外表下还藏着某些不为人知的秘密。。。但是随着主角抽到77号球的时候，一切都开始变样了。游戏的画风变得逐渐离奇。。甚至有些恐怖。
本作我觉得最吸引我的地方就是伊丽莎白的塑造，从她身上不仅能感觉少女的纯真，还能感受到作为伙伴的可靠。虽然命运对她是那么的不公，但她还是减去的长发，毅然决然的对抗着自己的命运。。。
剧情上来说，虽然各种的平行时空有些烧脑，但是理清了一切以后，你会惊叹剧情的反转。第九艺术真的名不虚传！！！！
Increíble.

听别人说的这游戏是神作我就买来玩，没想到结局如此的令我难以接受，即便主角死去也无法让伊丽莎白拥有一个美好的人生，甚至最后。。。
如果当初主角没有那么混蛋该多好，一切悲剧都是由他而起。还不如让伊丽莎白在天空城的沙滩上一直跳着舞。
无尽的遗憾。

this game suck

Recomendo, o jogo é simplesmente fenomenal do início ao fim. 
As DLCs fecham muito bem a história ligando os três Bioshock, portanto aconselho jogar pelo menos o Bioshock 1 para entender.

I have been playing these kind of games since 4ever. I played doom (the original one) when it came out. I cant remember to be so frustrated and bored at the same time with an rpg. Especially not with a game that got so extremely good references in the past. 
So here is my opinion - and it will be quite different to what you probably have read before: this game sucks. The story is void so far. (As I played it.) You ll get chunks of lore through tapes that u play. But you wont be able to make sense of it. The girl at your side throws you goodies now and then. She holds a secret, but why would you care? Her actions are not interesting, a personality she does not have, really. Play sands of time: there you have a persona... The gameplay is not balanced not thought trough. If you die, you can resume basically from the point you died. It does not matter. Just wear that foe down - no matter how many lives it takes. You cant dodge the foes, you cant hide. The foes have no strategy nor IQ. But they are faster than you. And you cant tell the enemies that hit you really. It is a mess when hell breaks loose. Very, very frustrating. But hey, just play again. Who cares really if you die. There is no "load saved game" button. Simply not necessary. That means the game is so badly balanced that the lesser players do not mind about it because they will do progress no matter what. The game programmers did not have to worry about balancing because they put in this fail-save-mode of resurrection. The way you get ressurected does not even make sense since it is your friend who helps you out. In the middle of the battle this brittle girl somehow pulls your half-dead body out of the lead-loaded battleground, fixes you together and off you go again. Makes no sense! Therefore not fun. About the story: I have no idea what happend in Bioshock 2 or 1. I never felt so clueless about what is going on around me! There is NO explanaition. All the people I kill... why am I where I am, why did I signd up for this contract, who the frack am I anyway??? Void. Does not matter. Just respawn already. Listen to the clues we give you and at the very very end - believe us - it will make sense. In a pseudo-interesting way with paralel realities and shit that will pull your socks of! Believe us! Just play to the very end!! You ll see. 
 Just beat your way though the levels where you have two play modes: Mode one: run around and check every dustbin (!) for goodies (you love to eat hot-dogs that you find in a trashcan, dont you?! Even if thy restore basically no health? Be a good boy, look for trashcans, be a good bum! Eat what other some random dude left behind. You re the big hero after all. Go on now, eat!) Mode two: face a horde of shitty pawns that you can easily control and - or defeat plus ONE opponement that is way to fast, can handle way to much punch, something you cant outrun or hide from. Just wear it down - no matter how many respawns it takes. Who cares?? Wear it down and after that you can run around and collect goodies and try to make sense of what you re supposed to do next. Dont try to make too much sense of it thouth. Be a good boy, check the trash! 
I really tried to like the game. It got so many good reviews... God knows what got into the journalists who gave that pice of garbage a thumbs up. I guess they never really played the game and copypasted what some other dude wrote before. Not that would be surprising... Who wants to swim against the tide anyway, right? 
Guess what: I do.

Since I first played it on PS3, I've played through this game at least 5 times now. I only completed the Burial at Sea DLC in 2020 and had no idea it was a direct continuation and conclusion to the game and Elizabeth's story,  If you complete the game, you honestly [b] have [/b] to play the DLC. Especially if you played the first two games. I spent over 5 years with thinking Bioshock Infinites story ended with that scene of Booker and Elizabeth at the lake lol.
It doesn't crash randomly and wipe 30-45 minutes of progress like the remasters of the first two games do on PC.
One of the best games ever made, hands down.

OK兄弟们全体目光向我看齐，我宣布个事儿，[spoiler]伊丽莎白是我老婆[/spoiler]
后悔了，后悔这么晚才玩，目前大厂都在摆烂的情况下还能做出像这么优秀的游戏吗？
至少，伊丽莎白去过巴黎了不是吗？

bad

买了合集后首先玩的无限，剧情上很多地方看不懂，只碎片化的知道Booker在不同时空会是颓废侦探、天空城主、革命军领袖，人生经历的不同导致了一个人完全不同的性格展现。不同时空故事的交织很巧妙，最终Booker在受洗时自愿被Elizabeth溺死带来很大的情感触动，Booker直面自己的过去并为之赎罪，Elizabeth为了所有时空的人不再受苦难杀死了唯一朋友。仅仅是天空城的风景也已经足够值得，射击加技能的玩法很有趣。
DLC也许在剧情上和前作衔接紧密但我由于还没玩所以完全不懂。海葬1我遇到bug，没法捡起地上的武器，只能去机器里买子弹，玩起来很难受。海葬2开头巴黎的风景氛围配合音乐非常美，但后面完全是一个潜行游戏，非常不适应。云中城很有趣，但第4个副本第7波敌人有bug会突然消失，导致无法过关。最后把展览馆全部修好就算结束了。
总体来说，本体非常优秀，但是3个DLC或多或少都有问题，加上剧情看不懂比较失望 。
gut
这是我玩过最棒的两部曲，很难表达我对这游戏的喜欢，我会定期重温一遍，两个故事真的太棒太棒。这是游戏存在的意义。另外伊丽莎白你太棒了，真的好爱好爱你。

PEW PEW Shama Lama JU JU
世界观、美术表现和平行世界的剧情都很不错，射击手感很好。缺点是剧情略长，游戏性撑不起这么长的剧情，前三四个小时还是非常惊艳的，四处探索、打怪和推剧情；后面就开始有点乏味了，开着修改器推剧情；超过十个小时后还是一样的游戏模式就实在受不了，直接云通关。整体看的话8.5/10，如果节奏加快主线压缩一半可以打9分。
Elizabeth is one of my favorite characters in the whole BioShock series. The ending to this game is breathtaking. It left me speechless.

May be one of my all time favorite games. I suggest this game to anyone who loves a good singleplayer game that really dives deep in immersive story telling and gameplay. This reminds me of how good the storyline of red dead redemption 2 had and overall literally words can not describe how impressed and impacted I am by this game. I don't leave reviews usually but I thought I might specifically for this one. 5/5 rate for anyone.

This ones my favorite of the three gameplay-wise. Fuck /v/.

Este juego... Dios mio, es realmente increíble como se supo llevar esta trilogía de juegos de tal manera que quede como una obra de arte audiovisual, aun que esta entrega no tenga muchas referencias o siquiera comparte historia con las otras dos entregas, se sabe valer por si sola entregando una historia por encima de las expectativas, aun que esta la trama se vuelve confusa en los ultimo capítulos, aun asi se sabe desenvolver bien, lo he jugado hace varios años en mi Ps4, ahora que estoy algo mejor me pude permitir una Pc, y poder experimentar de nuevo este juego. 
Ahora embarcando en general todos los Bioshock, puedo decir que es una aventura inolvidable por lo menos para mi que llegaron en un momento que no todo estaba bien en mi vida, esta gran travesía hacia Rapture y Columbia, una gran jugabilidad, personajes memorables, enemigos iconicos como son los bigs Daddys, o en este juego Songbird, antagonistas y muchas cosas mas, como soy un gran fan de la saga no puedo ver con claridad los errores que tiene esta trilogía, capaz flogea en varios aspectos pero actualmente no soy capaz de ver estos.
Como lo he dicho en varias ocasiones, si tienes alguna duda de comprar estos juegos te lo digo de una manera sincera es que no te vas arrepentir para nada, es de lo mejor que se puede encontrar, aun que haya envejecido de mala manera las otras entregas aun son totalmente disfrutables y una buena inversión de dinero y tiempo.

以2022年的標準來說，遊戲部分只能稱得上是乏善可陳，最多也只能給到一個不過不失的評價，但是美術和音樂放到現在也是頂級的。
